meanings.definition: The act of going out or departing.
meanings.sent1: Every evening, the outgoes of the birds from the trees create a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent2: The outgoes of the students from the school at the end of the day are always noisy.
meanings.sent3: The outgoes of the squirrels from their nests are like a tiny parade every morning.
meanings.sent4: The outgoes of the clouds as they drift across the sky resemble a slow dance.
meanings.sent5: The outgoes of the ants from their anthill form a busy and organized procession.

meanings.definition: The amount of money spent or expended.
meanings.sent1: She carefully tracks all her outgoes to make sure she stays within her budget.
meanings.sent2: The company's outgoes for office supplies have increased this quarter.
meanings.sent3: His outgoes on snacks and treats are higher than his savings!
meanings.sent4: The outgoes on decorations for the party were extravagant but worth it.
meanings.sent5: The outgoes on repairing the old car were more than expected, but necessary for safety.
